items.title: Notre Dame Football transfer portal roundup after a wild weekend
items.summary: If you were looking forward to the openiong of the transfer portal to get a few big offseason wins for Notre Dame, this past weekend was probably a little disappointing. Let’s quickly recap some of went on, and then maybe we can exhale a little bit, and put things into perspective. GONE Arguably two of […]

items.title: TRANSFER PORTAL: A handful of key Notre Dame targets have visits scheduled
items.summary: The college football transfer portal opened yesterday and it’s been reported that over 3000 college football players have submitted their names into the system. While some fans were expecting a commitment or two, the players are allowed to visit schools — and definitley should. Notre Dame already has a number of players lined up for […]

items.title: Notre Dame Men’s Lacrosse – 2026 Season Loading…
items.summary: Well that was exactly how we did NOT want the Notre Dame Football season to end. It’s been a few weeks since that dreadful selection show on Sunday, December 7th. I am sure I speak for many when I say that I am still not over our Irish not getting chosen into the field. It’s […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football: Al Washington to become new Irish linebackers coach
items.summary: The departure of Notre Dame linebackers coach, Max Bullough, created a big opening in the Irish staff at a position that is still loaded for the 2026 football season. Notre Dame is choosing to fill that role with an inside hire — irish defensive line coach, Al Washington. There were reports last month that both […]
